title: Pixel 2 stopped charging and shuts down when plugged in
content:
Phone started exhibiting the same bad behavior reported in other community posts like:

my pixel 2 xl suddenly stopped charging ...
Pixel 2 XL won't charge...
Pixel 2XL turning off when any cable plugged in / not charging
...

All those are locked but I need to add my voice to all the others who paid substantial amount for a now useless phone.
Just 4 months out of warranty.
Google support told me they could do nothing for me.

I'm extremely disappointed, for myself and for the hundreds of others who reported the same issue on these now locked thread.
